item.title: KMS
item.description: What is KMS? # AWS Key Management Service is a full management service to generate and manage encryption keys Key Concepts # Customer Master Key (CMK) # CMKs are primary resources created and managed by KMS. It’s a logical representation of a master key. It includes metadata like key ID, description, alias and key state. More importantly, it contains key materials which are used to encrypt and decrypt your data.
